Browning Public School will be bringing our draft plan to the board on Wednesday of next week. Since The end of school we have been preparing for this upcoming school year with a few different scenarios – distance learning being one. We have continued to refine each scenario that would best suit our students and staff. Our top priority is to support the safety and well-being of our entire community of students, staff, and their families.

We have been busy with online surveys for parents, community, students and staff and are also making individual phone calls to ensure that we have your voice and will share it with both the board and all of you.

The final scenarios/plans will be brought before the trustees this next week and once they are approved, it will be announced.

Students and staff, safety is first and foremost. Please remember to wear your masks.

Thank you.

Corrina Guardipee-Hall ED.S.
Superintendent

A wonderful and informative kickoff to January’s cultural day
